name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】1st generation Princess Party♪♪【#ホロ1期生6周年】 [fWXjydrUZo8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC segment featuring Akai Haato (Haachama) and Natsuiro Matsuri reflecting on their 6th anniversary and their performance of "Sayonara Princess."
Photoshoot section where Haachama and Matsuri perform various poses (Heart, Washoi, and Princess) for the audience.
Performance of the song "Plasmagic Seasons!" by the 1st generation members.

subtitles.original: はい、ちょっとね、並んでみるんじゃない。
subtitles.english: All right, let's try standing together.

subtitles.original: え、今は7年目？6年目？
subtitles.english: Wait, is this our 7th year? 6th year?

subtitles.original: 7年目。
subtitles.english: Our 7th year.

subtitles.original: 今ね、6年目を迎えた...
subtitles.english: We just reached our 6th year...

subtitles.original: 今6年目を迎えたんですけど...
subtitles.english: We just reached our 6th year, but...

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、まずね、原点に帰り...
subtitles.english: I want to go back to our roots first...

subtitles.original: ちょっと、まぁ、あの頃のツンケンした感じにね、戻って...
subtitles.english: And go back to that standoffish vibe from back then...

subtitles.original: 初心を思い出そうと、いうことでね。
subtitles.english: To remember our original intentions.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛かった！
subtitles.english: You were so cute!

subtitles.original: というわけよ！
subtitles.english: That's how it is!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛かったよ、はあとちゃんって感じだった。
subtitles.english: You were super cute, like the classic Haato-chan.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見てくれてたー？
subtitles.english: Were you watching carefully?

subtitles.original: この舞台を！
subtitles.english: This performance!

subtitles.original: 滑る要素が急にね...
subtitles.english: Suddenly the "slippery" element comes in...

subtitles.original: 急じゃない、とってつけたような、急じゃない！
subtitles.english: It wasn't sudden! It wasn't forced or sudden!

subtitles.original: そしてね、2人でね...
subtitles.english: And then, the two of us...

subtitles.original: そう、「さよならプリンセス」を歌いましたよ！
subtitles.english: Right, we sang "Sayonara Princess"!

subtitles.original: そう、これはね、やっぱお姫様っていうタイトルですから。
subtitles.english: Yeah, since the title has "Princess" in it.

subtitles.original: そう、プリンセスって付いてるからね、すごいちょっと安直...
subtitles.english: Yeah, because it says "Princess", it was a bit simplistic...

subtitles.original: なんだけど、でもさ、やっぱ可愛い系の曲で...
subtitles.english: But still, it's such a cute song...

subtitles.original: なんかちょっとこう、ポップな感じでね。
subtitles.english: With a bit of a pop feel to it.

subtitles.original: なんかポップ担当と可愛い担当って感じなんでね、ぴったりだったかなと思いますね。
subtitles.english: I think it was a perfect fit for the pop and cute roles.

subtitles.original: ぴったりの選曲でしたね。
subtitles.english: It was a perfect song choice.

subtitles.original: ちなみにこのペアはね、あの、グーチョキパ... グーチョキパじゃない。
subtitles.english: By the way, this pair was decided by... not Rock-Paper-Scissors.

subtitles.original: グッパ、グッパ、グッパで合わせみたいな感じでやりましたね。
subtitles.english: We used "Gu-pa" (Rock or Palm) to split the teams.

subtitles.original: それはさ、言わなくていいじゃん、わざわざ！
subtitles.english: You didn't have to say that out loud!

subtitles.original: それで合わさったはあとちゃんペアと向こうになるっていう。
subtitles.english: And that's how I ended up paired with Haato-chan.

subtitles.original: あえてね、2人でさ、仲良くてやったってことにしとこ、じゃあ。
subtitles.english: Let's just say we paired up because we're good friends.

subtitles.original: もういいじゃん、なんでなんで、ごめん！
subtitles.english: Fine, whatever! Why? I'm sorry!

subtitles.original: 仲良しですのでね、やりました。
subtitles.english: We did it because we're close friends.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、あの2人もやってたんだけど、撮影会をちょっとね、やりたくない？
subtitles.english: Anyway, the others did it too, but don't you want to do a photoshoot?

subtitles.original: やりたいやりたい！
subtitles.english: I do, I do!

subtitles.original: あれ、でもさ、ほら、あれは？てつ、てつ、てつ...
subtitles.english: Wait, what about... Tetsu, tetsu, tetsu...

subtitles.original: 何何？
subtitles.english: What, what?

subtitles.original: また間違えた！やだ！
subtitles.english: I messed up again! No way!

subtitles.original: あれカグヤって読むんだよ。
subtitles.english: That's read as "Kaguya."

subtitles.original: 何何？
subtitles.english: What is it?

subtitles.original: そうそう、カグヤ。リハでもなんかテツテツとか言ってて...
subtitles.english: Right, Kaguya. She was saying "Tetsu Tetsu" during rehearsal too...

subtitles.original: カグヤね。
subtitles.english: Kaguya, right.

subtitles.original: ほら、踊ってみたの振り返りしたいなと思ったけどさ。
subtitles.english: I wanted to look back on the "Dance Cover"...

subtitles.original: そう、カグヤもめっちゃ良かったですね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, Kaguya was really good too.

subtitles.original: みんなのね、セリフパート。
subtitles.english: Everyone's spoken parts.

subtitles.original: 清楚が光ってたけど、みんなのね、セリフパートがもう本当に個性が光ってました。
subtitles.english: Their purity was shining, but their personalities really stood out in the spoken lines.

subtitles.original: アキロゼのセクシーさやばかったよね。
subtitles.english: Aki-rose's sexiness was incredible, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: やばかったね、エロかった、エロいとか言っちゃダメだよ、公式で。
subtitles.english: It was crazy, so sexy. You shouldn't say "erotic" on an official stream!

subtitles.original: ということで、撮影会行きましょうか。
subtitles.english: Anyway, let's start the photoshoot.

subtitles.original: みんな何が欲しいの？
subtitles.english: What pose do you all want?

subtitles.original: ハートポーズ一旦やっとく？
subtitles.english: Should we do a heart pose first?

subtitles.original: 2人はこれだったけど、私達はちゃんと...
subtitles.english: The other two did this, but we'll do it properly...

subtitles.original: なんでだよ、リハでちゃんとやったよ！
subtitles.english: What do you mean? We did it right in rehearsal!

subtitles.original: やめて、押さないで！
subtitles.english: Stop it, don't push me!

subtitles.original: はい、ちゃんとやって、せーの...
subtitles.english: Okay, let's do it right. One, two...

subtitles.original: ハート！
subtitles.english: Heart!

subtitles.original: ちょっと割れてる、ねぇ、何で！
subtitles.english: It's a bit broken! Hey, why?!

subtitles.original: 次何にする？
subtitles.english: What's next?

subtitles.original: まつりちゃんはまつりちゃん、わっしょいポーズ？
subtitles.english: For Matsuri-chan, maybe the "Washoi" pose?

subtitles.original: わっしょいポーズって何？こんな感じ？
subtitles.english: What's the "Washoi" pose? Like this?

subtitles.original: そう！いいじゃん！こっちがいい？どっちがいいよ。
subtitles.english: Yes! That's good! This way? Which way do you like?

subtitles.original: わっしょーい！
subtitles.english: Washoi!

subtitles.original: せっかくさ、センターでお城がいい感じに見えるから...
subtitles.english: Since the castle looks so good from the center...

subtitles.original: あ、プリンセスっぽい感じのポーズで行こう。
subtitles.english: Oh, let's do a princess-like pose.

subtitles.original: ポーズ！あ、分かった、これ間にオタくんが入るとね...
subtitles.english: Pose! Oh, I see, if an "Otaku" stands between us...

subtitles.original: そうそう、どっちを選びますか？こっち？どっちを選ぶの？
subtitles.english: Exactly! Which one will you choose? This one? Which one?

subtitles.original: ハーレムじゃんこれ！
subtitles.english: This is a harem!

subtitles.original: めっちゃいいめっちゃいい！すごい！ツイートしてね、このタグで。
subtitles.english: So good, so good! Amazing! Please tweet it with the tag.

subtitles.original: え、待って、むせた！
subtitles.english: Wait, I choked!

subtitles.original: バカバカバカ、次行くぞ、次行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Dummy, dummy! Moving on, moving on!

subtitles.original: ということで戻りますね、次も頑張って盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's head back. Let's keep the energy up for the next part!

subtitles.original: すみません皆さん、連れて行くんで、失礼します！
subtitles.english: Sorry everyone, I'll take her with me. Excuse us!

subtitles.original: リハでやったことないのにやっちゃった！
subtitles.english: I did something we never even tried in rehearsal!

subtitles.original: Plasmagic Seasons!
subtitles.english: Plasmagic Seasons!

subtitles.original: 輝く夜空 瞬く星を追って
subtitles.english: Chasing the twinkling stars in the shining night sky

subtitles.original: 春風 君を乗せて 熱い夏が迎えるよ
subtitles.english: Carrying you on the spring breeze, a hot summer awaits

subtitles.original: 色めく秋が 背中を押したら
subtitles.english: When the colorful autumn gives a gentle push

subtitles.original: まっ白 冬吹きらり 巡りゆくストーリー
subtitles.english: Pure white winter sparkles, a story that comes around

subtitles.original: 何もわからない 一歩進んで
subtitles.english: Knowing nothing, taking one step forward

subtitles.original: やっとここまで たどり着けたね
subtitles.english: We've finally made it this far, haven't we?

subtitles.original: まちはピンクずっと 素敵なステージ
subtitles.english: The town is pink, a wonderful stage forever

subtitles.original: 一番に 絶対見せてあげるよ
subtitles.english: I'll definitely show you the best view

subtitles.original: 行こう Smile! Smile!
subtitles.english: Let's go! Smile! Smile!

subtitles.original: Catch up future!
subtitles.english: Catch up future!

subtitles.original: 無邪気に回る季節が 世界を
subtitles.english: The innocently turning seasons will change the world
